summary: Completed testing of Research Alerts feature implementation. Successfully verified removal of demo/curated tabs, PubMed search functionality, Research Alerts sidebar, Quick Browse topics, and external database links. Authentication flow works but session persistence needs improvement.

integration_issues.issue: User authentication session not persisting properly - user gets logged out after navigation/page refresh
Save Alert button not appearing when user is logged in and has performed search - likely due to authentication session issue

passed_tests: Research page loads without demo/curated tabs - only PubMed search
Research Alerts sidebar visible on Research page
Quick Browse by Topic section displays 10 topic buttons (curcumin, ashwagandha, omega-3, probiotics, vitamin d, magnesium, melatonin, berberine, quercetin, nac)
Additional Research Databases section visible with external links
PubMed search returns live results (tested with 'curcumin inflammation' and 'ashwagandha anxiety')
Search results display properly with article information and pagination
Authentication flow works - user can sign in with test@evidencemed.com / testpass123
Research Alerts sidebar shows appropriate messages for logged-in vs logged-out states
Quick Browse topic buttons update search input when clicked
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix authentication session persistence issue - users are getting logged out after page navigation/refresh, preventing Save Alert functionality from working properly. The authentication flow works but sessions don't persist.
